name: @luigi-project/container-private
description: luigi-container development version, only the public folder is being published to npm as a package

scripts.copyBundle: cp public/bundle.js public/bundle.js.map test-app/ || COPY public\* test-app\
scripts.serve: npm run build && npm run copyBundle && sirv -D test-app --no-clear
scripts.bundle:watch: chokidar "src/**/*.*" -c "npm run build && npm run copyBundle"
